text: Alright, so we just got inside of the

open for about Four years.
It was a beautiful mall, filled with kiosks,
Now it's been just ruined for two decades
I've never seen a shopping mall so strange

This place is amazing.
This building's been abandoned for

It's kind of strange for a mall right? All these pillars,
weird segments, it's like a labyrinth and
that's because it was built to be
similar to a bazaar, that's B-A-Z-A-A-R

It will come right in the middle.
When the sun is at it's Zenith, it's highest point,

I love visiting abandoned places because
20 years ago this place was completely
filled with people, with shops,
with teenagers getting tattoos, eating gelato...
It was fond place in many people's
memories. Now it's rubble. Plants are

later, making my own memories of a
completely different place. I'll never know what it was like
This is just what I see.
Spray paint cans. Old busted concrete.
